text: Henri "Rik" Van Looy (20 December 1933 â€“ 17 December 2024) was a Belgian professional cyclist. He won a gold medal at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Van Looy died on 17 December 2024 in Herentals, Belgium, two days before his 91st birthday.Rik Van Looy, morto il ciclista a 90 anni. "L'imperatore di Herentals" vinse due Mondiali e tutte le Classiche ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Belgium Category:Belgian cyclists
title: Rik Van Looy
